blocks.name: ccda
blocks.content: Extend class definition to include cardinal number addition.
blocks.origin: const class ccda { + }

blocks.name: diff.ccda.s
diff.ccda.c
diff.ccda.w
df-cda
blocks.content: Define cardinal number addition. Definition of cardinal sum in [Mendelson] p. 258. See ~ cdaval for its value and a description. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2004.)

blocks.name: cdafn
blocks.content: Cardinal number addition is a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdafn() {
  |- wfn(ccda, cxp(universe, universe))
} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, ccda, universe, universe, cun(cxp(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o))))
  df-cda(hs0, hs1)
  unex(cxp(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o)))
  xpex(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls))
  vex(hs0)
  snex(emptycls)
  xpex(cv(hs1), csn(c1o))
  vex(hs1)
  snex(c1o)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cdafn() {
  ⊢ +[Fn](𝕌 × 𝕌)
} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, ccda, universe, universe, ((hs0 × { ∅ })⋃(hs1 × { 1o })))
  df-cda(hs0, hs1)
  unex((hs0 × { ∅ }), (hs1 × { 1o }))
  xpex(hs0, { ∅ })
  vex(hs0)
  snex(emptycls)
  xpex(hs1, { 1o })
  vex(hs1)
  snex(c1o)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
}

blocks.name: cdaval
blocks.content: Value of cardinal addition. Definition of cardinal sum in [Mendelson] p. 258. For cardinal arithmetic, we follow Mendelson. Rather than defining operations restricted to cardinal numbers, we use this disjoint union operation for addition, while Cartesian product and set exponentiation stand in for cardinal multiplication and exponentiation. Equinumerosity and dominance serve the roles of equality and ordering. If we wanted to, we could easily convert our theorems to actual cardinal number operations via ~ carden , ~ carddom , and ~ cardsdom . The advantage of Mendelson's approach is that we can directly use many equinumerosity theorems that we already have available. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdaval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))))
} = {
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wcel(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), universe))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), universe), wa(wcel(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), universe)))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe), wcel(csn(emptycls), universe))
  p0ex()
  xpexg(c0, universe, csn(emptycls), universe)
  mpan2(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), universe), wcel(csn(c1o), universe))
  snex(c1o)
  xpexg(c2, universe, csn(c1o), universe)
  unexb(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))
  ovmpt2g(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), universe, ccda, cun(cxp(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o))), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o))))
  uneq1d(cxp(cv(hs0), csn(emptycls)), cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o)), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  xpeq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(emptycls))
  uneq2d(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(cv(hs1), csn(c1o)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  xpeq1(cv(hs1), c2, csn(c1o))
  df-cda(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cdaval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[+]c2)=((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c2 × { 1o })))
} = {
  syl2an(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, (c0[+]c2)=((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c2 × { 1o })), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  mpd3an3(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[+]c2)=((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c2 × { 1o })), ((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c2 × { 1o }))∈ 𝕌)
  sylib((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), ((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c2 × { 1o }))∈ 𝕌, ((c0 × { ∅ })∈ 𝕌 ∧(c2 × { 1o })∈ 𝕌))
  anim12i(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 × { ∅ })∈ 𝕌, (c2 × { 1o })∈ 𝕌)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 × { ∅ })∈ 𝕌, { ∅ } ∈ 𝕌)
  p0ex()
  xpexg(c0, universe, { ∅ }, universe)
  mpan2(c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c2 × { 1o })∈ 𝕌, { 1o } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c1o)
  xpexg(c2, universe, { 1o }, universe)
  unexb((c0 × { ∅ }), (c2 × { 1o }))
  ovmpt2g(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, ((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c2 × { 1o })), universe, ccda, ((hs0 × { ∅ })⋃(hs1 × { 1o })), ((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(hs1 × { 1o })))
  uneq1d((hs0 × { ∅ }), (hs1 × { 1o }), (c0 × { ∅ }), hs0 = c0)
  xpeq1(hs0, c0, { ∅ })
  uneq2d((c0 × { ∅ }), (hs1 × { 1o }), (c2 × { 1o }), hs1 = c2)
  xpeq1(hs1, c2, { 1o })
  df-cda(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c2 × { 1o })))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c2 × { 1o })))
}

blocks.name: uncdadom
blocks.content: Cardinal addition dominates union. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm uncdadom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(cun(c0, c2), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c2)))
} = {
  breqtrrd(cun(c0, c2), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wbr(cun(c0, c2), cdom, cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wbr(c0, cdom, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(c2, cdom, cxp(c2, csn(c1o))))
  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cdom, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wbr(c0, cen, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  xpsneng(c0, c1, emptycls, universe)
  ensym(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0)
  endom(c0, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  3syl(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c2, cdom, cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, c2), wbr(c2, cen, cxp(c2, csn(c1o))))
  mpan2(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, c2), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  xpsneng(c2, c3, c1o, con0)
  ensym(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), c2)
  endom(c2, cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))
  mpan2(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(c2, cdom, cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wbr(cun(c0, c2), cdom, cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wceq(cin(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), emptycls))
  xp01disj(c0, c2)
  undom(c0, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), c2, cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))
  cdaval(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: cdaun
blocks.content: Cardinal addition is equinumerous to union for disjoint sets. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdaun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cen, cun(c0, c2)))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(co(c0, ccda, c2), cen, cun(c0, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))))
  cdaval(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  3impa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wbr(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), cen, cun(c0, c2)))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wbr(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), cen, cun(c0, c2)), wa(wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, c2)), wa(wceq(cin(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), emptycls), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, c2))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  xpsneng(c0, c1, emptycls, universe)
  mpan2(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, c2), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  xpsneng(c2, c3, c1o, con0)
  jctl(wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), emptycls))
  xp01disj(c0, c2)
  unen(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0, cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), c2)
}

blocks.name: cdaen
blocks.content: Cardinal addition of equinumerous sets. Exercise 4.56(b) of [Mendelson] p. 258. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdaen(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cen, co(c1, ccda, c3)))
} = {
  3brtr4d(co(c0, ccda, c2), cen, co(c1, ccda, c3), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(c1o))), wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3)))
  syl2an(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wbr(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), cen, cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(c1o)))), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, cxp(c3, csn(c1o))))
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wbr(c0, cen, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))))
  sylancl(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  xpsneng(c0, universe, emptycls, universe)
  mpdan(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c0, cen, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), wbr(c1, cen, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))))
  ensymd(c1, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  sylancl(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cen, c1), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  xpsneng(c1, universe, emptycls, universe)
  entr(c0, c1, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)))
  entr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)))
  syl2anc(wbr(c2, cen, c3), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, cxp(c3, csn(c1o))), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, c2), wbr(c2, cen, cxp(c3, csn(c1o))))
  sylancl(wbr(c2, cen, c3), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, c2), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1o, con0))
  xpsneng(c2, universe, c1o, con0)
  mpdan(wbr(c2, cen, c3), wbr(c2, cen, cxp(c3, csn(c1o))), wbr(c3, cen, cxp(c3, csn(c1o))))
  ensymd(c3, cxp(c3, csn(c1o)), wbr(c2, cen, c3))
  sylancl(wbr(c2, cen, c3), wbr(cxp(c3, csn(c1o)), cen, c3), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  xpsneng(c3, universe, c1o, con0)
  entr(c2, c3, cxp(c3, csn(c1o)))
  entr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), c2, cxp(c3, csn(c1o)))
  mpanr12(wa(wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cen, cxp(c3, csn(c1o)))), wbr(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), cen, cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(c1o)))), wceq(cin(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), emptycls), wceq(cin(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(c1o))), emptycls))
  xp01disj(c0, c2)
  xp01disj(c1, c3)
  unen(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cxp(c3, csn(c1o)))
  syl2an(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cen, c1)
  brrelex1i(c2, cen, c3)
  cdaval(c0, universe, c2, universe)
  syl2an(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wceq(co(c1, ccda, c3), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c3, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  brrelex2i(c0, cen, c1)
  brrelex2i(c2, cen, c3)
  relen()
  cdaval(c1, universe, c3, universe)
}

blocks.name: cdaenun
blocks.content: Cardinal addition is equinumerous to union for disjoint sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdaenun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cen, cun(c1, c3)))
} = {
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cen, cun(c1, c3)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cen, co(c1, ccda, c3)), wbr(co(c1, ccda, c3), cen, cun(c1, c3)))
  3adant3(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cen, co(c1, ccda, c3)))
  cdaen(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl3an(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls), wbr(co(c1, ccda, c3), cen, cun(c1, c3)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls))
  brrelex2i(c0, cen, c1)
  brrelex2i(c2, cen, c3)
  relen()
  id(wceq(cin(c1, c3), emptycls))
  cdaun(c1, universe, c3, universe)
  entr(co(c0, ccda, c2), co(c1, ccda, c3), cun(c1, c3))
}

blocks.name: cda1en
blocks.content: Cardinal addition with cardinal one (which is the same as ordinal one). Used in proof of Theorem 6J of [Enderton] p. 143. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cda1en(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c0))), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1o), cen, csuc(c0)))
} = {
  syl6breqr(co(c0, ccda, c1o), cen, csuc(c0), cun(c0, csn(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c0))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c0))), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1o), cen, cun(c0, csn(c0))), wbr(c0, cen, c0), wbr(c1o, cen, csn(c0)), wceq(cin(c0, csn(c0)), emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c0)), wbr(c0, cen, c0))
  enrefg(c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c0)), wbr(c1o, cen, csn(c0)))
  ensymd(c1o, csn(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  ensn1g(c0, c1)
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c0))), wceq(cin(c0, csn(c0)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c0)))
  disjsn(c0, c0)
  cdaenun(c0, c0, c1o, csn(c0))
  df-suc(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cda1en(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c0)→(c0[+]1o)[≅]suc(c0))
} = {
  syl6breqr((c0[+]1o), cen, suc(c0), (c0 ⋃ { c0 }), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c0))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c0), (c0[+]1o)[≅](c0 ⋃ { c0 }), c0[≅]c0, 1o[≅]{ c0 }, (c0 ⋂ { c0 })= ∅)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c0 ∈ c0, c0[≅]c0)
  enrefg(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c0 ∈ c0, 1o[≅]{ c0 })
  ensymd(c1o, { c0 }, c0 ∈ c1)
  ensn1g(c0, c1)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c0 ∈ c0), (c0 ⋂ { c0 })= ∅, ¬ c0 ∈ c0)
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c0 ∈ c0)
  disjsn(c0, c0)
  cdaenun(c0, c0, c1o, { c0 })
  df-suc(c0)
}

blocks.name: cda1dif
blocks.content: Adding and subtracting one gives back the original set. Similar to ~ pncan for cardinalities. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cda1dif(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)), wbr(cdif(co(c1, ccda, c1o), csn(c0)), cen, c1))
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)), wbr(cdif(co(c1, ccda, c1o), csn(c0)), cen, c1), wbr(cdif(co(c1, ccda, c1o), csn(c0)), cen, cdif(co(c1, ccda, c1o), csn(cop(emptycls, c1o)))), wbr(cdif(co(c1, ccda, c1o), csn(cop(emptycls, c1o))), cen, c1))

  ovexd(c1, ccda, c1o, wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)))
  id(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)))
  syl5eleqr(cop(emptycls, c1o), co(c1, ccda, c1o), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)))
  mpbir(wcel(cop(emptycls, c1o), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))), wss(csn(cop(emptycls, c1o)), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))))
  eqsstr3i(csn(cop(emptycls, c1o)), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))
  ssun2(cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)))
  snss(cop(emptycls, c1o), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))))
  opex(emptycls, c1o)

  eqbrtrd(cdif(co(c1, ccda, c1o), csn(cop(emptycls, c1o))), cen, c1, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)))
  syl6eqr(cdif(co(c1, ccda, c1o), csn(cop(emptycls, c1o))), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cdif(cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), csn(cop(emptycls, c1o))), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)))
  difeq1d(co(c1, ccda, c1o), csn(cop(emptycls, c1o)), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccda, c1o)), wceq(co(c1, ccda, c1o), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  cdaval(c1, universe, c1o, con0)
  3eqtr2i(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cdif(cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), csn(cop(emptycls, c1o))), cdif(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), cdif(cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))))
  mpbi(wceq(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cdif(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))), wceq(cin(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), emptycls))
  xp01disj(c1, c1o)

  difun2(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))

  eqtri(cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)), csn(cop(emptycls, c1o)), cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)))

blocks.name: pm110.643
blocks.content: 1+1=2 for cardinal number addition, derived from ~ pm54.43 as promised. Theorem *110.643 of _Principia Mathematica_, vol. II, p. 86, which adds the remark, "The above proposition is occasionally useful." Whitehead and Russell define cardinal addition on collections of all sets equinumerous to 1 and 2 (which for us are proper classes unless we restrict them as in ~ karden ), but after applying definitions, our theorem is equivalent. The comment for ~ cdaval explains why we use ` ~~ ` instead of =. See ~ pm110.643ALT for a shorter proof that doesn't use ~ pm54.43 . (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm pm110.643() {
  |- wbr(co(c1o, ccda, c1o), cen, c2o)
} = {
  eqbrtri(co(c1o, ccda, c1o), cen, c2o, cun(cxp(c1o, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(c1o, ccda, c1o), cun(cxp(c1o, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c1o, con0), wcel(c1o, con0))
  cdaval(c1o, con0, c1o, con0)
  mpbi(wbr(cun(cxp(c1o, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), cen, c2o), wceq(cin(cxp(c1o, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), emptycls))
  xp01disj(c1o, c1o)
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cin(cxp(c1o, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), emptycls), wbr(cun(cxp(c1o, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o))), cen, c2o)), wbr(cxp(c1o, csn(emptycls)), cen, c1o), wbr(cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)), cen, c1o))
  xpsnen(c1o, emptycls)
  0ex()
  xpsnen(c1o, c1o)
  elexi(c1o, con0)
  1on()
  pm54.43(cxp(c1o, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))
}

blocks.name: cda0en

blocks.name: cdacomen
blocks.content: Commutative law for cardinal addition. Exercise 4.56(c) of [Mendelson] p. 258. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdacomen(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, co(c1, ccda, c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, co(c1, ccda, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))

  mpan2(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cen, c0), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  xpsneng(c0, universe, c1o, con0)
  mpan2(wcel(c1, universe), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cen, c1), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  xpsneng(c1, universe, emptycls, universe)
  syl2an(wbr(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cen, c0), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cen, c1), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, cun(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wbr(c0, cen, cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), wbr(c1, cen, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))))
  ensym(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), c0)
  ensym(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), c1)
  mp3an3(wbr(c0, cen, cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), wbr(c1, cen, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, cun(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)))), wceq(cin(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), emptycls))
  eqtri(cin(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), emptycls, cin(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))))
  incom(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)))
  xp01disj(c1, c0)
  cdaenun(c0, cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), c1, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)))
  syl6eq(co(c1, ccda, c0), cun(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wceq(co(c1, ccda, c0), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))))
  cdaval(c1, universe, c0, universe)
  uncom(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))
  3brtr4d(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, co(c1, ccda, c0), emptycls, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  a1i(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), wbr(emptycls, cen, emptycls))
  enref(emptycls)

  ndmov(c0, universe, c1, ccda)
  sylnbi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(co(c1, ccda, c0), emptycls), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe)))
  ancom(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  ndmov(c1, universe, c0, ccda)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(ccda), cxp(universe, universe)), wfn(ccda, cxp(universe, universe)))

thm cdadom1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cdom, co(c1, ccda, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cdom, co(c1, ccda, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  3brtr4d(co(c0, ccda, c2), cdom, co(c1, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl2an(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wbr(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), cdom, cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cdom, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cdom, cxp(c2, csn(c1o))))
  xpdom1(c0, c1, csn(emptycls))
  snex(emptycls)
  syl(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cdom, cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), universe))
  mpan2(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), universe), wcel(csn(c1o), universe))
  snex(c1o)
  xpexg(c2, universe, csn(c1o), universe)
  domrefg(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), universe)
  mpan2(wa(wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cdom, cxp(c1, csn(emptycls))), wbr(cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cdom, cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wbr(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), cdom, cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wceq(cin(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o))), emptycls))
  xp01disj(c1, c2)
  undom(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))
  sylan(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cdom, c1)
  cdaval(c0, universe, c2, universe)
  sylan(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wceq(co(c1, ccda, c2), cun(cxp(c1, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c2, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  brrelex2i(c0, cdom, c1)
  reldom()
  cdaval(c1, universe, c2, universe)
  syl6eqbr(co(c0, ccda, c2), cdom, co(c1, ccda, c2), emptycls, wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wcel(c2, universe))))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wcel(c2, universe))), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c2), emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))))
  intnand(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wcel(c2, universe))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  simpr(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  ndmov(c0, universe, c2, ccda)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(ccda), cxp(universe, universe)), wfn(ccda, cxp(universe, universe)))
  cdafn()
  fndm(ccda, cxp(universe, universe))
  0dom(co(c1, ccda, c2))
  ovex(c1, ccda, c2)
}

blocks.content: A set is dominated by its cardinal sum with another. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: cdaxpdom
blocks.content: Cartesian product dominates disjoint union for sets with cardinality greater than 1. Similar to Proposition 10.36 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 93. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdaxpdom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wbr(c1o, csdm, c1)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, cxp(c0, c1)))
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wbr(c1o, csdm, c1)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, cxp(c0, c1)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, cxp(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o)))), wbr(cxp(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), cen, cxp(c0, c1)))
  eqbrtrd(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, cxp(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), wa(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wbr(c1o, csdm, c1)))
  syl2an(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wbr(c1o, csdm, c1), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c1), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  cdaval(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  syl2an(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wbr(c1o, csdm, c1), wbr(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), cdom, cxp(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o)))), wbr(c1o, csdm, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(c1o, csdm, cxp(c1, csn(c1o))))
  ibir(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wbr(c1o, csdm, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  syl(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wb(wbr(c1o, csdm, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(c1o, csdm, c0)), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0))
  sdomen2(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0, c1o)
  ibir(wbr(c1o, csdm, c1), wbr(c1o, csdm, cxp(c1, csn(c1o))))
  syl(wbr(c1o, csdm, c1), wb(wbr(c1o, csdm, cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), wbr(c1o, csdm, c1)), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), cen, c1))
  sdomen2(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), c1, c1o)
  unxpdom(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o)))
  syl2an(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wbr(c1o, csdm, c1), wbr(cxp(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), cen, cxp(c0, c1)), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), cen, c1))
  sylancl(wbr(c1o, csdm, c0), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  brrelex2i(c1o, csdm, c0)
  0ex()
  xpsneng(c0, universe, emptycls, universe)
  sylancl(wbr(c1o, csdm, c1), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), cen, c1), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1o, con0))
  brrelex2i(c1o, csdm, c1)
  relsdom()
  1on()
  xpsneng(c1, universe, c1o, con0)
  xpen(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0, cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), c1)
  domentr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cxp(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), cxp(c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: cdafi
blocks.content: The cardinal sum of two finite sets is finite. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdafi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), csdm, com))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(co(c0, ccda, c1), csdm, com, cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), wa(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com)))
  syl2an(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c1), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  cdaval(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  syl2an(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com), wbr(cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o))), csdm, com), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), csdm, com), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), csdm, com))
  ibir(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), csdm, com))
  syl(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wb(wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), csdm, com), wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0))
  sylancl(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  brrelex1i(c0, csdm, com)
  0elon()
  xpsneng(c0, universe, emptycls, con0)
  sdomen1(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0, com)
  ibir(wbr(c1, csdm, com), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), csdm, com))
  syl(wbr(c1, csdm, com), wb(wbr(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com)), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), cen, c1))
  sylancl(wbr(c1, csdm, com), wbr(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), cen, c1), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1o, con0))
  brrelex1i(c1, csdm, com)
  relsdom()
  1on()
  xpsneng(c1, universe, c1o, con0)
  sdomen1(cxp(c1, csn(c1o)), c1, com)
  unfi2(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1, csn(c1o)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cdafi(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0[≺]_om ∧ c1[≺]_om)→(c0[+]c1)[≺]_om)
} = {
  eqbrtrd((c0[+]c1), csdm, com, ((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c1 × { 1o })), (c0[≺]_om ∧ c1[≺]_om))
  syl2an(c0[≺]_om, c1[≺]_om, (c0[+]c1)=((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c1 × { 1o })), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  cdaval(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  syl2an(c0[≺]_om, c1[≺]_om, ((c0 × { ∅ })⋃(c1 × { 1o }))[≺]_om, (c0 × { ∅ })[≺]_om, (c1 × { 1o })[≺]_om)
  ibir(c0[≺]_om, (c0 × { ∅ })[≺]_om)
  syl(c0[≺]_om, ((c0 × { ∅ })[≺]_om ↔ c0[≺]_om), (c0 × { ∅ })[≅]c0)
  sylancl(c0[≺]_om, (c0 × { ∅ })[≅]c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∅ ∈ On)
  brrelex1i(c0, csdm, com)
  0elon()
  xpsneng(c0, universe, emptycls, con0)
  sdomen1((c0 × { ∅ }), c0, com)
  ibir(c1[≺]_om, (c1 × { 1o })[≺]_om)
  syl(c1[≺]_om, ((c1 × { 1o })[≺]_om ↔ c1[≺]_om), (c1 × { 1o })[≅]c1)
  sylancl(c1[≺]_om, (c1 × { 1o })[≅]c1, c1 ∈ 𝕌, 1o ∈ On)
  brrelex1i(c1, csdm, com)
  relsdom()
  1on()
  xpsneng(c1, universe, c1o, con0)
  sdomen1((c1 × { 1o }), c1, com)
  unfi2((c0 × { ∅ }), (c1 × { 1o }))
}

blocks.name: cdainflem
blocks.content: Any partition of omega into two pieces (which may be disjoint) contains an infinite subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdainflem(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wo(wbr(c0, cen, com), wbr(c1, cen, com)))
} = {
  mpd(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wo(wbr(c0, cen, com), wbr(c1, cen, com)), wn(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com))))
  con2i(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wa(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com)))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com)), wn(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com)), wbr(cun(c0, c1), csdm, com))
  unfi2(c0, c1)
  sdomnen(cun(c0, c1), com)
  syl5bi(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wn(wa(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com))), wo(wbr(c0, cen, com), wbr(c1, cen, com)), wo(wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, com))))
  ianor(wbr(c0, csdm, com), wbr(c1, csdm, com))
  orim12d(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, com)), wbr(c0, cen, com), wbr(c1, cen, com))
  ex(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wbr(c0, cen, com))
  sylibr(wa(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com))), wbr(c0, cen, com), wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com))))
  anim1i(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  mpancom(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c0, cdom, cun(c0, c1)))
  mpisyl(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wbr(c0, cdom, cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), universe), wss(c0, cun(c0, c1)))
  ssun1(c0, c1)
  ssdomg(cun(c0, c1), universe, c0)
  domentr(c0, cun(c0, c1), com)
  bren2(c0, com)
  ex(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, com)), wbr(c1, cen, com))
  sylibr(wa(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, com))), wbr(c1, cen, com), wa(wbr(c1, cdom, com), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, com))))
  anim1i(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wn(wbr(c1, csdm, com)), wbr(c1, cdom, com))
  mpancom(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wbr(c1, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, cun(c0, c1)))
  mpisyl(wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, com), wbr(c1, cdom, cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), universe), wss(c1, cun(c0, c1)))
  brrelex1i(cun(c0, c1), cen, com)
  relen()
  ssun2(c1, c0)
  ssdomg(cun(c0, c1), universe, c1)
  domentr(c1, cun(c0, c1), com)
  bren2(c1, com)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cdainflem(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om →(c0[≅]_om ∨ c1[≅]_om))
} = {
  mpd((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, (c0[≅]_om ∨ c1[≅]_om), ¬(c0[≺]_om ∧ c1[≺]_om))
  con2i((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, (c0[≺]_om ∧ c1[≺]_om))
  syl((c0[≺]_om ∧ c1[≺]_om), ¬(c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≺]_om)
  unfi2(c0, c1)
  sdomnen((c0 ⋃ c1), com)
  syl5bi((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, ¬(c0[≺]_om ∧ c1[≺]_om), (c0[≅]_om ∨ c1[≅]_om), (¬ c0[≺]_om ∨ ¬ c1[≺]_om))
  ianor(c0[≺]_om, c1[≺]_om)
  orim12d((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, ¬ c0[≺]_om, ¬ c1[≺]_om, c0[≅]_om, c1[≅]_om)
  ex((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, ¬ c0[≺]_om, c0[≅]_om)
  sylibr(((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om ∧ ¬ c0[≺]_om), c0[≅]_om, (c0[≼]_om ∧ ¬ c0[≺]_om))
  anim1i((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, ¬ c0[≺]_om, c0[≼]_om)
  mpancom((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, c0[≼]_om, c0[≼](c0 ⋃ c1))
  mpisyl((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, c0[≼](c0 ⋃ c1), (c0 ⋃ c1)∈ 𝕌, c0 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1))
  ssun1(c0, c1)
  ssdomg((c0 ⋃ c1), universe, c0)
  domentr(c0, (c0 ⋃ c1), com)
  bren2(c0, com)
  ex((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, ¬ c1[≺]_om, c1[≅]_om)
  sylibr(((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om ∧ ¬ c1[≺]_om), c1[≅]_om, (c1[≼]_om ∧ ¬ c1[≺]_om))
  anim1i((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, ¬ c1[≺]_om, c1[≼]_om)
  mpancom((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, c1[≼]_om, c1[≼](c0 ⋃ c1))
  mpisyl((c0 ⋃ c1)[≅]_om, c1[≼](c0 ⋃ c1), (c0 ⋃ c1)∈ 𝕌, c1 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1))
  brrelex1i((c0 ⋃ c1), cen, com)
  relen()
  ssun2(c1, c0)
  ssdomg((c0 ⋃ c1), universe, c1)
  domentr(c1, (c0 ⋃ c1), com)
  bren2(c1, com)
}

blocks.name: cdainf
blocks.content: A set is infinite iff the cardinal sum with itself is infinite. (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cdainf(class c0) {
  |- wb(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(com, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)))
} = {
  impbii(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(com, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)))
  mpdan(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(com, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)))
  syl2anc(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex2i(com, cdom, c0)
  reldom()
  cdadom3(c0, universe, c0, universe)
  domtr(com, c0, co(c0, ccda, c0))
  mpcom(wbr(com, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl(wbr(com, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wne(co(c0, ccda, c0), emptycls))
  infn0(co(c0, ccda, c0))
  simpld(wne(co(c0, ccda, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  necon1ai(co(c0, ccda, c0), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, universe)))
  ndmov(c0, universe, c0, ccda)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(ccda), cxp(universe, universe)), wfn(ccda, cxp(universe, universe)))
  cdafn()
  fndm(ccda, cxp(universe, universe))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(com, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0)))))
  domen(hs0, com, co(c0, ccda, c0))
  ovex(c0, ccda, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0))), wbr(com, cdom, c0))
  syld(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0))), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(cun(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))), cen, com))
  ex(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0))), wbr(cun(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))), cen, com))
  eqbrtrd(cun(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))), cen, com, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0)))))
  syl5eqr(cun(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))), cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs0), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0)))))
  indi(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0)))), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))))
  sseqtrd(cv(hs0), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), co(c0, ccda, c0), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0)))))
  simprr(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0)))), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c0), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  simpl(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0))))
  cdaval(c0, universe, c0, universe)
  df-ss(cv(hs0), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(com, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccda, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, com))
  ensym(com, cv(hs0))
  syl5(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cun(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o)))), cen, com), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wo(wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cen, com), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), cen, com)))
  cdainflem(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))))
  jaod(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cen, com), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), cen, com), wbr(com, cdom, c0))
  syl5ibcom(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cen, com), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdom, c0))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdom, c0), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdom, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0))
  mpisyl(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cdom, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe), wss(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe), wcel(csn(emptycls), universe))
  snex(emptycls)
  xpexg(c0, universe, csn(emptycls), universe)
  inss2(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)))
  ssdomg(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), universe, cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  xpsneng(c0, universe, emptycls, universe)
  domentr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls))), cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), c0)

  syl5ibcom(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), cen, com), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), cdom, c0))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), cdom, c0), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), cdom, cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), wbr(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), cen, c0))
  mpisyl(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), cdom, cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), universe), wss(cin(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))), cxp(c0, csn(c1o))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(c1o)), universe), wcel(csn(c1o), universe))
  snex(c1o)
  xpexg(c0, universe, csn(c1o), universe)

blocks.name: infcda1

blocks.origin:
thm infcda1(class c0) {

  sylancl(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wceq(co(c0, ccda, c1o), cun(cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)), cxp(c1o, csn(c1o)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1o, con0))
  cdaval(c0, universe, c1o, con0)

  xp01disj(c0, c1o)

  mpdan(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(com, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c1o)), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c1o)))

blocks.name: pwcda1
blocks.content: The sum of a powerset with itself is equipotent to the successor powerset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwcda1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0)), cen, cpw(co(c0, ccda, c1o))))
} = {
  ensymd(co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0)), cpw(co(c0, ccda, c1o)), wcel(c0, c1))
  breqtrd(cpw(co(c0, ccda, c1o)), cen, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0)), cxp(cpw(c0), cpw(c1o)), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cpw(co(c0, ccda, c1o)), cen, cxp(cpw(c0), cpw(c1o))), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  pwcdaen(c0, c1, c1o, con0)
  syl5eq(cxp(cpw(c0), cpw(c1o)), co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0)), cxp(cpw(c0), c2o), wcel(c0, c1))
  xpeq2i(cpw(c0), cpw(c1o), c2o)
  3eqtr4i(cpw(c1o), c2o, cpw(csn(emptycls)), cpr(emptycls, csn(emptycls)))
  pwpw0()
  pweqi(c1o, csn(emptycls))
  df1o2()
  df2o2()
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(cpw(c0), c2o), co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  xp2cda(cpw(c0), universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwcda1(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(P(c0)[+]P(c0))[≅]P((c0[+]1o)))
} = {
  ensymd((P(c0)[+]P(c0)), P((c0[+]1o)), c0 ∈ c1)
  breqtrd(P((c0[+]1o)), cen, (P(c0)[+]P(c0)), (P(c0)× P(1o)), c0 ∈ c1)
  mpan2(c0 ∈ c1, P((c0[+]1o))[≅](P(c0)× P(1o)), 1o ∈ On)
  1on()
  pwcdaen(c0, c1, c1o, con0)
  syl5eq((P(c0)× P(1o)), (P(c0)[+]P(c0)), (P(c0)× 2o), c0 ∈ c1)
  xpeq2i(P(c0), P(1o), c2o)
  3eqtr4i(P(1o), c2o, P({ ∅ }), { ∅, { ∅ } })
  pwpw0()
  pweqi(c1o, { ∅ })
  df1o2()
  df2o2()
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, (P(c0)× 2o)=(P(c0)[+]P(c0)), P(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  xp2cda(P(c0), universe)
}

blocks.name: pwcdaidm
blocks.content: If the natural numbers inject into ` A ` , then ` ~P A ` is idempotent under cardinal sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)

blocks.name: cdalepw
blocks.content: If ` A ` is idempotent under cardinal sum and ` B ` is dominated by the power set of ` A ` , then so is the cardinal sum of ` A ` and ` B ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)

  syl2anc(wa(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0))), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, co(cpw(c0), ccda, cpw(c0))), wbr(c0, cdom, cpw(c0)), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0)))

  syl2anc(wa(wa(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0))), wne(c0, emptycls)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1o), cdom, c0), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1o), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0))
  syl(wa(wa(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0))), wne(c0, emptycls)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1o), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)), wbr(c1o, cdom, c0))

  biimpar(wa(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0))), wne(c0, emptycls), wbr(emptycls, csdm, c0))
  syl(wa(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0))), wb(wbr(emptycls, csdm, c0), wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(c0, universe))
  adantr(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex2i(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0)
  relen()

  simpll(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0)), wne(c0, emptycls))

  pwdom(co(c0, ccda, c1o), c0)
  domtr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cpw(co(c0, ccda, c1o)), cpw(c0))
  sylancr(wa(wbr(co(c0, ccda, c0), cen, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c0))), wbr(co(emptycls, ccda, c1), cdom, cpw(c0)), wbr(co(emptycls, ccda, c1), cen, co(c1, ccda, emptycls)), wbr(co(c1, ccda, emptycls), cdom, cpw(c0)))

blocks.name: onacda
blocks.content: The cardinal and ordinal sums are always equinumerous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm onacda(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wbr(co(c0, coa, c1), cen, co(c0, ccda, c1)))
} = {
  ensymd(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, ccda, c1), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  breqtrrd(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, co(c0, coa, c1), cun(c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, cun(c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))), wbr(c0, cen, c0), wbr(c1, cen, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cin(c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wbr(c0, cen, c0))
  enrefg(c0, con0)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wbr(c1, cen, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, con0), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))), c1, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))), c1, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cin(crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))), c0), emptycls))
  f1oeng(c1, con0, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))), crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))
  syl5eq(cin(c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), emptycls, cin(crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))), c0), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  incom(c0, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wceq(cin(crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))), c0), emptycls), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))), c1, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wa(wf1o(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))), c1, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cin(crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))), c0), emptycls)))
  oacomf1olem(hs0, c1, c0, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0))))
  cdaenun(c0, c0, c1, crn(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)))))
  oarec(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm onacda(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On)→(c0[+o]c1)[≅](c0[+]c1))
} = {
  ensymd((c0[+o]c1), (c0[+]c1), (c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On))
  breqtrrd((c0[+]c1), cen, (c0[+o]c1), (c0 ⋃ ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)))), (c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), (c0[+]c1)[≅](c0 ⋃ ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)))), c0[≅]c0, c1[≅]ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0))), (c0 ⋂ ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0))))= ∅)
  adantr(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, c0[≅]c0)
  enrefg(c0, con0)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), c1[≅]ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0))), c1 ∈ On, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)): c1 ↔ ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)))))
  simpr(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On)
  simpld((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)): c1 ↔ ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)))), (ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)))⋂ c0)= ∅)
  f1oeng(c1, con0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)), ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0))))
  syl5eq((c0 ⋂ ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)))), emptycls, (ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0)))⋂ c0), (c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On))
  incom(c0, ran((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[+o]hs0))))

blocks.name: cdanum

blocks.name: unnum

blocks.name: unctb
blocks.content: The union of two countable sets is countable. (Contributed by FL, 25-Aug-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm unctb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, com)), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cdom, com))
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, com)), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cdom, com), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c1)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, com))
  syl2an(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, com), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  ctex(c0)
  ctex(c1)
  uncdadom(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  sylancl(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, com)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, co(com, ccda, com)), wbr(co(com, ccda, com), cdom, com))
  syl2an(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, co(com, ccda, com)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, co(com, ccda, c1)), wbr(co(com, ccda, c1), cdom, co(com, ccda, com)))
  cdadom1(c0, com, c1)
  cdadom2(c1, com, com)
  domtr(co(c0, ccda, c1), co(com, ccda, c1), co(com, ccda, com))
  mp2an(wbr(co(com, ccda, com), cdom, com), wbr(co(com, ccda, com), cdom, cxp(com, com)), wbr(cxp(com, com), cen, com))
  mp2(wbr(co(com, ccda, com), cdom, cxp(com, com)), wcel(cxp(com, com), universe), wss(co(com, ccda, com), cxp(com, com)))
  xpex(com, com)
  eqsstr3i(co(com, ccda, com), cxp(com, com), cxp(com, c2o))
  ax-mp(wceq(cxp(com, c2o), co(com, ccda, com)), wcel(com, universe))
  omex()
  xp2cda(com, universe)
  ax-mp(wss(cxp(com, c2o), cxp(com, com)), wss(c2o, com))
  mp2an(wss(c2o, com), word(com), wcel(c2o, com))
  ordom()
  2onn()
  ordelss(com, c2o)
  xpss2(c2o, com, com)
  ssdomg(cxp(com, com), universe, co(com, ccda, com))
  xpomen()
  domentr(co(com, ccda, com), cxp(com, com), com)
  domtr(co(c0, ccda, c1), co(com, ccda, com), com)
  domtr(cun(c0, c1), co(c0, ccda, c1), com)
}

thm unctb(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0[≼]_om ∧ c1[≼]_om)→(c0 ⋃ c1)[≼]_om)
} = {
  syl2anc((c0[≼]_om ∧ c1[≼]_om), (c0 ⋃ c1)[≼]_om, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≼](c0[+]c1), (c0[+]c1)[≼]_om)
  syl2an(c0[≼]_om, c1[≼]_om, (c0 ⋃ c1)[≼](c0[+]c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ctex(c0)
  ctex(c1)
  uncdadom(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  sylancl((c0[≼]_om ∧ c1[≼]_om), (c0[+]c1)[≼]_om, (c0[+]c1)[≼](_om[+]_om), (_om[+]_om)[≼]_om)
  syl2an(c0[≼]_om, c1[≼]_om, (c0[+]c1)[≼](_om[+]_om), (c0[+]c1)[≼](_om[+]c1), (_om[+]c1)[≼](_om[+]_om))
  cdadom1(c0, com, c1)
  cdadom2(c1, com, com)
  domtr((c0[+]c1), (_om[+]c1), (_om[+]_om))
  mp2an((_om[+]_om)[≼]_om, (_om[+]_om)[≼](_om × _om), (_om × _om)[≅]_om)
  mp2((_om[+]_om)[≼](_om × _om), (_om × _om)∈ 𝕌, (_om[+]_om)⊆(_om × _om))
  xpex(com, com)
  eqsstr3i((_om[+]_om), (_om × _om), (_om × 2o))
  ax-mp((_om × 2o)=(_om[+]_om), _om ∈ 𝕌)
  omex()
  xp2cda(com, universe)
  ax-mp((_om × 2o)⊆(_om × _om), 2o ⊆ _om)
  mp2an(2o ⊆ _om, Ord(_om), 2o ∈ _om)
  ordom()
  2onn()
  ordelss(com, c2o)
  xpss2(c2o, com, com)
  ssdomg((_om × _om), universe, (_om[+]_om))
  xpomen()
  domentr((_om[+]_om), (_om × _om), com)
  domtr((c0[+]c1), (_om[+]_om), com)
  domtr((c0 ⋃ c1), (c0[+]c1), com)
}

blocks.name: infcdaabs
blocks.content: Absorption law for addition to an infinite cardinal. (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm infcdaabs(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, c0))

  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, c0), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, c0), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, c0), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, cxp(c0, c0)), wbr(cxp(c0, c0), cen, c0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, cxp(c0, c0)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, cxp(c0, c2o)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2o), cdom, cxp(c0, c0)))
  breqtrrd(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, cxp(c0, c2o), co(c0, ccda, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c0)))
  cdadom2(c1, c0, c0)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wceq(cxp(c0, c2o), co(c0, ccda, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
  xp2cda(c0, cdm(ccrd))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2o), cdom, cxp(c0, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(c2o, cdom, c0))
  sylancr(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(c2o, cdom, c0), wbr(c2o, cdom, com), wbr(com, cdom, c0))
  mp2b(wbr(c2o, cdom, com), wcel(c2o, com), wbr(c2o, csdm, com))
  2onn()
  nnsdom(c2o)
  sdomdom(c2o, com)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0))
  domtr(c2o, com, c0)
  xpdom2g(c0, cdm(ccrd), c2o, c0)
  domtr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cxp(c0, c2o), cxp(c0, c0))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0), wbr(cxp(c0, c0), cen, c0))
  infxpidm2(c0)
  domentr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cxp(c0, c0), c0)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, ccda, c1)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c1, universe))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  brrelex1i(c1, cdom, c0)
  reldom()
  cdadom3(c0, cdm(ccrd), c1, universe)
  sbth(co(c0, ccda, c1), c0)
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(card)∧ _om[≼]c0 ∧ c1[≼]c0)→(c0[+]c1)[≅]c0)
} = {
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ dom(card)∧ _om[≼]c0 ∧ c1[≼]c0), (c0[+]c1)[≅]c0, (c0[+]c1)[≼]c0, c0[≼](c0[+]c1))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ dom(card)∧ _om[≼]c0 ∧ c1[≼]c0), (c0[+]c1)[≼]c0, (c0[+]c1)[≼](c0 × c0), (c0 × c0)[≅]c0)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ dom(card)∧ _om[≼]c0 ∧ c1[≼]c0), (c0[+]c1)[≼](c0 × c0), (c0[+]c1)[≼](c0 × 2o), (c0 × 2o)[≼](c0 × c0))
  breqtrrd((c0[+]c1), cdom, (c0 × 2o), (c0[+]c0), (c0 ∈ dom(card)∧ _om[≼]c0 ∧ c1[≼]c0))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ dom(card), _om[≼]c0, c1[≼]c0, (c0[+]c1)[≼](c0[+]c0))
  cdadom2(c1, c0, c0)
  syl((c0 ∈ dom(card)∧ _om[≼]c0 ∧ c1[≼]c0), (c0 × 2o)=(c0[+]c0), c0 ∈ dom(card))
  xp2cda(c0, dom(card))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ dom(card)∧ _om[≼]c0 ∧ c1[≼]c0), (c0 × 2o)[≼](c0 × c0), c0 ∈ dom(card), 2o[≼]c0)
  sylancr((c0 ∈ dom(card)∧ _om[≼]c0 ∧ c1[≼]c0), 2o[≼]c0, 2o[≼]_om, _om[≼]c0)
  mp2b(2o[≼]_om, 2o ∈ _om, 2o[≺]_om)
  2onn()
  nnsdom(c2o)
  sdomdom(c2o, com)
  simp2(c0 ∈ dom(card), _om[≼]c0, c1[≼]c0)

  xpdom2g(c0, dom(card), c2o, c0)
  domtr((c0[+]c1), (c0 × 2o), (c0 × c0))

  simp1(c0 ∈ dom(card), _om[≼]c0, c1[≼]c0)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ dom(card), _om[≼]c0, c1[≼]c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1i(c1, cdom, c0)
  reldom()
  cdadom3(c0, dom(card), c1, universe)

blocks.name: infunabs
blocks.content: An infinite set is equinumerous to its union with a smaller one. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm infunabs(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cen, c0))

  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cdom, c0), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c1)), wbr(co(c0, ccda, c1), cen, c0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wbr(cun(c0, c1), cdom, co(c0, ccda, c1)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c1, universe))
  uncdadom(c0, cdm(ccrd), c1, universe)

  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0)), wcel(cun(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(c1, universe))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wbr(c1, cdom, c0), wcel(c1, universe))

blocks.name: infxp

  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0)), wa(wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(c1, cdom, c0))), wbr(cxp(c0, c1), cen, cun(c0, c1)), wbr(cxp(c0, c1), cen, c0), wbr(c0, cen, cun(c0, c1)))

  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(c1, cdm(ccrd)), wne(c1, emptycls), wbr(cxp(c0, c1), cen, cxp(c1, c0)))

  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(ccda), cxp(universe, universe)), wfn(ccda, cxp(universe, universe)))

  fndm(ccda, cxp(universe, universe))
  1on()
  xpsneng(c1, universe, c1o, con0)

blocks.name: infpss
blocks.content: Every infinite set has an equinumerous proper subset, proved without AC or Infinity. Exercise 7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 91. See also ~ infpssALT . (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm infpss(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wex(s0, wa(wpss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, wbr(com, cdom, c0), wex(s0, wa(wpss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sylib(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  infn0(c0)
  n0(hs0, c0)
  elabd(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), wa(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wpss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0)), wa(wpss(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c0)))
  adantr(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), universe))
  syl(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex2i(com, cdom, c0)
  reldom()
  difexg(c0, universe, csn(cv(hs0)))
  jca(wa(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wpss(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c0))
  sylib(wa(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wpss(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  simpr(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  difsnpss(cv(hs0), c0)
  adantr(wbr(com, cdom, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c0))
  infdifsn(c0, cv(hs0))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0)))), wpss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0), wpss(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c0))
  psseq1(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)
  breq1(cv(s0), cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(com, cdom, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wa(wpss(cv(s0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cen, c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wpss(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c0), wbr(cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c0))
  diff.wpss.s(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs0))), cen, c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cen.s(s0)
}

thm infpss(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (_om[≼]c0 → ∃(s0,(s0 ⊊ c0 ∧ s0[≅]c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, _om[≼]c0, ∃(s0,(s0 ⊊ c0 ∧ s0[≅]c0)), hs0 ∈ c0)
  sylib(_om[≼]c0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0), c0 ≠ ∅)
  infn0(c0)
  n0(hs0, c0)
  elabd(s0, (c0 \ { hs0 }), (_om[≼]c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (s0 ⊊ c0 ∧ s0[≅]c0), ((c0 \ { hs0 })⊊ c0 ∧(c0 \ { hs0 })[≅]c0))
  adantr(_om[≼]c0, hs0 ∈ c0, (c0 \ { hs0 })∈ 𝕌)
  syl(_om[≼]c0, (c0 \ { hs0 })∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex2i(com, cdom, c0)
  reldom()
  difexg(c0, universe, { hs0 })
  jca((_om[≼]c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (c0 \ { hs0 })⊊ c0, (c0 \ { hs0 })[≅]c0)
  sylib((_om[≼]c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (c0 \ { hs0 })⊊ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  simpr(_om[≼]c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  difsnpss(hs0, c0)
  adantr(_om[≼]c0, hs0 ∈ c0, (c0 \ { hs0 })[≅]c0)
  infdifsn(c0, hs0)
  anbi12d(s0 =(c0 \ { hs0 }), s0 ⊊ c0, s0[≅]c0, (c0 \ { hs0 })⊊ c0, (c0 \ { hs0 })[≅]c0)
  psseq1(s0, (c0 \ { hs0 }), c0)
  breq1(s0, (c0 \ { hs0 }), cen, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(_om[≼]c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0,(s0 ⊊ c0 ∧ s0[≅]c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 \ { hs0 })⊊ c0, (c0 \ { hs0 })[≅]c0)
  diff.wpss.s(s0, (c0 \ { hs0 }), c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, (c0 \ { hs0 }), cen, c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, { hs0 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cen.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: infmap2
blocks.content: An exponentiation law for infinite cardinals. Similar to Lemma 6.2 of [Jech] p. 43. Although this version of ~ infmap avoids the axiom of choice, it requires the powerset of an infinite set to be well-orderable and so is usually not applicable. (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
